member.name: T:TripMate.Helpers.PasswordHelper
member.summary: Helper for secure password hashing and verification. Uses SHA256 for local storage (production apps should use bcrypt or Argon2).

member.summary: Service locator for resolving dependencies when constructor injection is not available (e.g. Shell DataTemplate).

member.summary: Converts non-empty string to true, empty to false.

member.name: T:TripMate.Models.Expense
member.summary: Represents an expense within a trip.

member.name: T:TripMate.Models.ExpenseSplitType
member.summary: How an expense is split among members.

member.name: T:TripMate.Models.ExpenseSplit
member.summary: Represents a single person's share of an expense. Used for both equal and custom splits.

member.name: T:TripMate.Models.Trip
member.summary: Represents a group trip with members and expenses.

member.name: T:TripMate.Models.TripStatus
member.summary: Trip status enumeration.

member.name: T:TripMate.Models.TripMember
member.summary: Junction table linking users to trips (many-to-many).

member.name: T:TripMate.Models.User
member.summary: Represents a user in the TripMate application. Stored locally for authentication and trip membership.
